Uses of Interface
edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.formats.Formatter

  • Packages that use Formatter 
    Package Description
    edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.formats
    Contains different formatters

    • Uses of Formatter in edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.formats

      Classes in edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.formats that implement Formatter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractFormatter
      Base class for all Formatters.
      class  JsonLdFormatter
      JSON-LD Formatter that can be used for JSON-LD Requests.
      class  NquadsFormatter
      Formatter implementing N-QUADS
      class  RdfXmlFormatter
      Formatter implementing RDF/XML
      class  SimpleFormatter
      This class implements a simple formatter that needs no parsing of additional information in Accept or Content-Type headers and is completely clear with just format and format string info
      class  TurtleFormatter
      Formatter implementing TURTLE
      Methods in edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.formats that return Formatter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Formatter ContentTypeParser.getFormatter()
      Returns the formatter implementing the format recognized during parsing the header
      Formatter ContentNegotiator.getFormatter()
      Returns the client's most wanted Formatter This either is the one with the highest Q-Rating, or if none are provided, the first in the list that can be used.
      Formatter FormatRegistry.getFormatter(java.lang.String formatString)
      Gets and instance of the formatter that implements the given format.
      Methods in edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.formats that return types with arguments of type Formatter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Formatter> ContentNegotiator.getFormatters()
      Return a list of all recognized formatters the client requested ordered by client preference
      Methods in edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.formats with parameters of type Formatter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double ContentNegotiator.getQValue(Formatter formatter)
      The Q value weight provided for the given formatter. 0.5 if none existed.
      protected void FormatRegistry.registerFormatter(Formatter formatter)
      Registers a given formatter
